Identity.History: "Two whales on his hook / did the mighty Hymir / Soon pull up / on a single cast."\nUnknown, Hymiskvi√∞a, 13th century CE.
Identity.Tooltip: The Germanics are thought to have used skinboats, similar to the Irish curragh, as small rowing vessels.\nFish the waters for Food. Garrison a support or infantry unit inside to boost fishing rate.
